verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>,

Greatly <S%G1971>desiring<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, being <S%G3415>mindful<s%> of <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G1144>tears<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> I may be <S%G4137>filled<s%> with <S%G5479>joy<s%>; Greatly: or, remembering thy tears, I greatly desire to see thee that

When I <S%G2983>call<s%> to <S%G5280>remembrance<s%> the <S%G505>unfeigned<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> that is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1774>dwelt<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3125>grandmother<s%> <S%G3090>Lois<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G2131>Eunice<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> I am <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>.

<S%G1223>Wherefore<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G156><s%> I <S%G363>put<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> in <S%G363>remembrance<s%> that thou stir <S%G329>up<s%> the <S%G5486>gift<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the putting <S%G1936>on<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>hath<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G1167>fear<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> of <S%G1411>power<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G26>love<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of a sound <S%G4995>mind<s%>.

<S%G1870>Be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1870>thou<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> of the <S%G3142>testimony<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G3366>nor<s%> of <S%G1691>me<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1198>prisoner<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> be thou partaker of the <S%G4777>afflictions<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>;

<S%G3588>Who<s%> hath <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> us with an <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G2821>calling<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4286>purpose<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the world <S%G5550>began<s%> <S%G166><s%>,

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5319>is<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> made <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G2015>appearing<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4990>Saviour<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G3303>who<s%> hath <S%G2673>abolished<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> hath <S%G5461>brought<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G861>immortality<s%> to <S%G5461>light<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>:

<S%G1519>Whereunto<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am <S%G5087>appointed<s%> a <S%G2783>preacher<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G1320>teacher<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>.

<S%G1223>For<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G156>cause<s%> <S%G3958>I<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>: <S%G235>nevertheless<s%> I <S%G1870>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1870>ashamed<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G4100>believed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> am <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1415>able<s%> to <S%G5442>keep<s%> that which <S%G3450>I<s%> have committed unto <S%G3866>him<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>. believed: or, trusted

Hold <S%G2192>fast<s%> the <S%G5296>form<s%> of <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> thou hast <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

That good <S%G2570>thing<s%> which was committed unto <S%G3872>thee<s%> <S%G5442>keep<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1774>dwelleth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%>.

<S%G5124>This<s%> thou <S%G1492>knowest<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> they which are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G773>Asia<s%> be turned away <S%G654>from<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>; of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G5436>Phygellus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2061>Hermogenes<s%>.

The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1325>grant<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> that he may <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> in how many <S%G3745>things<s%> he ministered unto <S%G1247>me<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%>, <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1097>knowest<s%> very <S%G957>well<s%>.
